outputs.output_descr: The project  aims to support the Government's Disaster Management Programme by strengthening  national and  community level capacities to conduct vulnerability reduction programmes in selected flood-prone communities in the parishes of St. James, St. Ann and Clarendon, utilizing successful approaches used in communities of the Rios Cobre and Grande Valley.  Landslide mapping will be carried out for the parish of  St. Mary. In addition,  two national  workshops will be conducted, one at the beginning of the project and the other at the end, which will serve to review methodologies and best practices for developing community flood-warning systems in selected Central American countries and the Caribbean.

project_descr: Support to Community-based Disaster Management in the Parishes of St. James, St. Ann, Clarendon, Portland and St. Mary
